info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 9:32PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Broadwater, southeastern Meagher and northeastern Gallatin Counties through 1015 PM MDT... At 931 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles east of Townsend to 12 miles east of Toston. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, half inch hail, and a period of heavy rain showers. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Martinsdale, Maudlow, Lennep and Ringling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
